item.description:
Want to try out the bootcamps?  We have a new class structure to fit with the upcoming Diva Dash in September!!  Do you want to be on your way to becoming "Diva-Licious"?  Then try out this class!!!

OUTDOOR BOOTCAMP!

Join us every Monday and Wednesday evening for an outdoor bootcamp workout!

Classes will be every Monday and Wednesday evening after Couch to 5K

A 1 hour full body workout using resistance & strength training to work legs, arms, gluts and core as well as flexibility training.

Regular Payment Options:

  • Drop in Rate for one class is $10 per person.
  • Prepay for 10 classes for $90 and get one FREE!

Classes will be held in mist or light rain but will be canceled due to heavy rains (and added on at the end for makeup).

Braintree HS, meet by the track at the football field.

Monday & Wednesday nights

7:15-8:15pm

PLEASE BRING WITH YOU:

  • Hand weights
  • Mat or Towel to place on ground
  • Water

 

Please check out www.BodyByOrsillo.com for more information on the classes and on Julie.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the track at the football field

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: FREE BOOTCAMP!!!
